com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Class KInstanceOpaqueRegular

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.kernel.types.KInstanceOpaqueRegular
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KInstanceOpaqueType, KInstanceType

    @EqualityReference
public final class KInstanceOpaqueRegular
extends Object
implements KInstanceOpaqueType
    A mesh with an opaque material, with a specific transform and texture matrix.
